public interface PlaylistMapper

    • Method Detail

      • getPlaylist

        @Select(value="select * from tb_pms_playlist where id = #{id}")
 @Result(property="bgPic",column="bg_pic") @Result(property="creatorId",column="creator_id") @Result(property="itemCount",column="songs_count")
PMSLibrary getPlaylist(Long id)
        Get playlist by playlist's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        id - Playlist's id in pms.
        Returns:
        The detail playlist in pms.

      • getPlaylistsByCreatorId

        @Select(value="select * from tb_pms_playlist where creator_id = #{creatorId} limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}")
 @Result(property="bgPic",column="bg_pic") @Result(property="creatorId",column="creator_id") @Result(property="itemCount",column="songs_count")
List<PMSLibrary> getPlaylistsByCreatorId(Long creatorId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int pageSize)
        Get paged playlists by creator's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        creatorId - Creator's id in pms.
        offset - Offset.
        pageSize - Page size.
        Returns:
        Paged playlists with creator's id.

      • getDetailPlaylist

        @Select(value="select * from tb_pms_playlist a join tb_pms_detail_playlist b on a.id = b.id where a.id = #{id}")
 @Result(property="creatorId",column="creator_id") @Result(property="createTime",column="create_time") @Result(property="updateTime",column="update_time") @Result(property="itemCount",column="songs_count")
PMSDetailLibrary getDetailPlaylist(Long id)
        Get detail playlist by playlist's id in pms.
        Parameters:
        id - Playlist's id in pms.
        Returns:
        Detail pms library.

      • getCountOfPlaylistsWithCreatorId

        @Select(value="select count(*) from tb_pms_playlist where creator_id = #{creatorId}")
int getCountOfPlaylistsWithCreatorId(Long creatorId)
        Get the count of pms playlists with the creator id.
        Parameters:
        creatorId - Creator's id of playlist in pms.
        Returns:
        Count of playlists with the creator id.

      • createPlaylist

        @InsertProvider(type=PlaylistSqlProvider.class,
                method="createPlaylist")
 @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id")
int createPlaylist(PMSDetailLibrary library)
        Create playlist in pms.
        Parameters:
        library - The pms detail library to insert.
        Returns:
        The id of created playlist in pms.

      • deletePlaylist

        @Delete(value="delete from tb_pms_playlist where id = #{id}")
int deletePlaylist(Long id)
        Delete playlist in pms by playlist's id.
        Parameters:
        id - Playlist's id in pms.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 for fail.

      • deletePlaylists

        @DeleteProvider(type=PlaylistSqlProvider.class,
                method="deletePlaylists")
int deletePlaylists(@Param(value="ids")
                                                                                                              List<Long> ids)
        Delete playlists in pms by ids.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of playlist's ids to delete in pms.
        Returns:
        Count of deleted playlists.

      • updatePlaylist

        @UpdateProvider(type=PlaylistSqlProvider.class,
                method="updatePlaylist")
int updatePlaylist(PMSDetailLibrary library)
        Update playlist in pms.
        Parameters:
        library - New pms library to update.
        Returns:
        1 for success, 0 for fail.
